# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = split(str, '\n')
    for i in eachindex(lines)
        if length(lines[i]) > text_width
            # 在当前行和下一行之间插入换行符
            insert!(lines, i+1, "\n")
        end
    end
    return join(lines, '\n')
end
```

示例：

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello World This is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line.")
"Hello World\nThis is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line."
```
